data.title: At the Top; 302; Herbie Mann & the Family of Man
data.meta_description:
This episode features a performance of jazz flutist, Herbie Mann, and his
band the Family of Mann. Also included is a guest performance by soul singer
Cissy Houston.
At the Top features performances from big band performers.
